ModMetaData.name: GUI Developer Mode
ModMetaData.author: AIvanCP
ModMetaData.description:
A comprehensive GUI Developer Mode replacement for RimWorld that mimics vanilla debug tools behavior with a user-friendly interface.
Features: - **Item Spawning Tab**: Browse all spawnable items with icons and proper in-game names. Performance-optimized with item display limits (configurable 500-5000 items) to prevent lag with large mod lists. Click items to see detailed popup with description, mod source, and stack controls. Uses vanilla debug targeting behavior. - **Terrain Tab**: Select terrain types and click on map to place. Behaves exactly like vanilla debug mode. - **Actions Tab**: Comprehensive scrollable interface with explosion tools, time controls, weather manipulation, and targeting actions. No more GUI resizing needed - everything scrolls smoothly. - **Explosion System**: Auto-detects 488+ explosion types from all mods including gas, acid, tear gas, extinguish foam, steam, and more. Visual radius preview with customizable parameters. - **Time Skip System**: Tick-based simulation that properly updates all game systems or optional quick mode for instant results. - **Performance Optimizations**: Smart caching system, configurable item limits, and efficient rendering for smooth operation even with hundreds of mods. - **Vanilla Debug Integration**: Reuses RimWorld's built-in debug functions for authentic behavior - **Smart GUI Behavior**: Window closes automatically after selecting items/terrain (like vanilla debug mode) - **Right-Click Cancel**: Cancel targeting mode by right-clicking (like vanilla debug mode) - **Universal Compatibility**: Works with all modded items, terrains, and content automatically
Perfect replacement for developer mode debug tools with enhanced usability and performance!
